column6: "FRANKEN-CASTLE," PART 3 Trapped in the dank tunnels under New York, surrounded by a savage team of Japanese monster hunters, filthy in the blood of his friends, Frank Castle turns, lifts a giant rifle and smiles. They aren't prepared for this, you aren't prepared for this, an entire issue loaded full, completely dedicated to bleeding, sweet, revenge-splattered murder in traditional hardcore Punisher style. Frank's been through hell -- time to give a little back. Parental Advisory ...$2.99
column8: | colorist:Dan Brown | penciler:Mike McKone | penciller:Tony Moore | writer:Rick Remender
